E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Progress of Scott Sanders
Dear Sir,
Scott Sanders has nothing more to prove at A San Jose Giants!
He has an ERA of 3.76 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/7/1990
Subject: Progress of Brian Williams
Dear Sir,
Brian Williams has an ERA of 2.71 at A San Jose Giants!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dennis Lewallyn
